reviewText: I should have looked more carefully before purchasing this. I was under the impression that this was the first fight between the two, however, it is not labeled as the second fight between the two which only lasts one round. The first one was a classic brawl that ended with one of the most memorable knockouts in boxing history. Just be cautious as this is NOT the classic 13 round war.
Be aware that this is the second fight between these two great fighters which didn't last as Rocky scored an early KO which Walcott desputed. Very short fight.
